title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: In 1767 he bought the farm of Kilduff, in East Lothian, where he remained until he removed  to Edinburgh, thirteen years later.

title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: David carried the discussion so far that on his death-bed he added a codicil to his will, written with his own hand, to this effect : " I leave to my friend Mr. John Home, of Kilduff, ten dozen of my old claret at his choice ; and one other bottle of that other liquor called port.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Mr. John Home, of Kilduff, ten dozenof my old claret, at his choice; and one Bingle bottle of thatother liquor called port.
